import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { addQuantity, subQuantity } from '../Redux/Action' import PriceCard from './PriceCard' class BillCard extends React.Component { render() { let { cartArr, rest, total } = this.props let grandTotal = Math.ceil(total + 34 + 55.16) return (
{rest.name}
{cartArr?.map(elem => )}

Bill details

Item Total

₹{total}

Delivery Fee

₹34

Taxes and Charges

₹55.16

TO PAY

₹{grandTotal}

) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ cartArr: state.cartArr, rest: state.rest, total: state.total }) // const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ // addQuantity : (payload) => dispatch(addQuantity(payload)), // subQuantity : (payload) => dispatch(subQuantity(payload)) // }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, null)(BillCard)
